participant_2.background:
I am an introvert night owl studying radiology in my 20s.
some jokes go too far.
the weather here is very cold , but so beautiful in the spring.
my desire is to become a fashion designer.
I am a student and my family is in business.

content.text: Not much, just studying for my radiology test. What about you?
I'm getting ready for my shift at work. What do you want to be when you're done with school?
I want to be a fashion designer. I love clothes and I think it would be really fun to create my own designs.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it. I'm not sure what I want to be when I grow up. I'm thinking about going into healthcare, but I'm not sure what exactly I want to do.
Healthcare is a great field. I have a few friends who are in healthcare and they really enjoy their jobs.
Yeah, it seems like it could be a really rewarding career.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, go for walks with my dog, and play the piano.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love video games too. I don't have a dog, but I love going for walks. I've never played the piano before, but I've always wanted to learn.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relax.
